title: AFL WAG Clementine McVeigh stuns in an $8,000 outfit in Hawaii
text:
She's known for her love of labels and incredible style.

And on Wednesday, AFL WAG Clementine McVeigh was dripping in designer, while on holiday in Hawaii with husband Jarrad after his retirement from the game.

Taking to Instagram, the 35-year-old shared snaps of herself looking gorgeous in an $8,000 ensemble at the luxurious Halekulani Hotel.

Dripping in designer! AFL WAG Clementine McVeigh stunned in an $8,000 outfit on Wednesday while holidaying in Hawaii with husband Jarrad following his retirement

Clementine turned heads on the day in a white floral dress by Australian label Bec + Bridge, worth $450.

The brunette teamed her look with a pair of nude rockstud sandals by Maison Valentino, worth $1,190.

Clementine accessorised her look with a pair of Chloé sunglasses, valued at $620, and a pink floral headband by Gucci, which retails for $505.

Sitting pretty! Clementine turned heads on the day in a white floral dress by Australian label Bec + Bridge, worth $450. The brunette teamed her look with a pair of nude rockstud sandals by Maison Valentino, worth $1,190,00

To complete her ensemble, she added a black Dior calfskin bag, worth an estimated $4,996.

'Hawaiian nights,' Clementine captioned one post.

She captioned a selfie of herself: 'Floral on Floral, Gucci and Bec and Bridge, a match made in heaven in my eyes.'

The stylish WAG's fashion-laden post follows Jarrad's official retirement from playing football as the 2019 AFL season came to an end on Saturday.

Glamorous: Clementine also accessorised her look with a pair of Chloé sunglasses, valued at $620, and a pink floral head band by Gucci, which retails for $505

On Saturday, Clementine wrote on Instagram: 'Today was an extremely special moment as the love of my life waved for the last time on his retirement lap of honour at the MCG.'

In August, Jarrad, 34, announced that the 2019 AFL season, his 17th at the highest level, would be his last.

He played his last game on August 24 with the Sydney Swans.

From November, Jarrad will take on a new role as part of John Longmire's coaching staff for the Sydney Swans.
description: She's known for her love of labels and incredible style.
authors: Alisha Buaya For Daily Mail Australia
